original: 董卓得知華雄被斬，派出呂布出戰，呂布揮舞方天戟、腳跨赤兔馬，兩位部將轉瞬死於戟下，另外兩位大將則遭受重創。
text: Dong Zhuo learned that Hua Xiong had been beheaded and sent Lu Bu to fight. Lu Bu wielded a square halberd and straddled a red rabbit horse. Two generals died instantly under the halberds, and the other two generals suffered heavy injuries.
